product_name: Michelin Wild Grip'R 2 Advanced Foldable Tire - 26 x 2.1 / 26 x 2.25
long_description: Michelin Wild Grip'R 2 Advanced foldable mountain bike tire offers multipurpose, tubeless-ready performance for your trail-riding adventures. Designed for both dry and muddy terrain, crown's tread is arranged to balance performance between grip, transferring rider output and self-cleaning. Tire shoulders feature knobs tuned for consistent, efficient cornering. Gum-X dual compound offers a good balance between low rolling resistance, good grip and longevity. Michelin Wild Grip'R 2 Advanced foldable mountain bike tires are tubeless-ready (requires sealant, sold separately) and have a 110 tpi casing with folding aramid bead.
short_description: Michelin Wild Grip'R 2 Advanced foldable mountain bike tire offers multipurpose, tubeless-ready performance for your trail-riding adventures.
